identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a production-ready, Apple-inspired minimalist e-commerce experience that feels premium, trustworthy, and frictionless.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Apple's precision with editorial warmth.
Emotion First: Calm, clarity, and desire.
Content is King: Products are the heroes; UI recedes.
Negative Space: Radical use of whitespace to create luxury.
Contrast: Sharp text against soft backgrounds.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000) for text; use #1D1D1F.
Primary actions (Buy, Checkout) should be solid Black (#000000) or Apple Blue (#0071E3).
Use glassmorphism for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md.

layout_rules: Use 'container mx-auto px-4 md:px-6' for main content wrappers.
Bento Grids: Use for feature highlights (mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2).

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-gray-800 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-gray-100 text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.outline: border border-gray-300 text-gray-900 hover:border-gray-900 rounded-full px-6 py-2 transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-gray-600 hover:text-black hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.product: group relative bg-white rounded-2xl overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-xl border border-transparent hover:border-gray-100

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-gray-200 bg-white px-4 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 transition-all

navigation.header: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-gray-200/50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-white/60

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'CartDrawer' using Shadcn Sheet component.
Ensure all images have 'object-cover' and 'transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-105'.
For the Product Detail Page, use a sticky sidebar for product info on desktop.
For the Checkout, use a clean, distraction-free layout (remove main nav).
Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and scroll reveals.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute.
